content.detailedDescription:
On 6-23-2012 at 10:30pm my partner and i saw approximately 15 ufos cross through the night sky and disappear in cloud cover. we were in a ne facing room on the 2nd story of our house and suddenly saw 2 bright balls of light coming from under our line of sight (obscured by houses, trees, etc) and elevating higher into the sky as they traveled in an easterly direction. we tried looking through binoculars to get a better idea of what we were looking at, but that ended up being fruitless as we were at a distance of 1-2 miles away, as they still just looked like balls of light. as soon as the first two disappeared into the cloud cover another two appeared from where the first had originated. that seemed to open the flood gates, as there were never less than 2 in the visible sky, and yet never more than 4. this went on for several minutes until finally one seemed to slow down and hover as it appeared to wait for what ended up being the last ball of light to make its way across the sky.

we are in one of the flight paths of pdx, and routinely see planes and helicopters come and go. of course we immediately thought they were planes, but that thought quickly left. if these were planes, they were unlike any we've ever seen. they were *bright* balls of yellow/white light (no blinking, no red or blue lights), completely silent, moved more methodically, were plentiful and in quick succession, and then of course there is the issue of the 2nd to last object stopping and hovering as it appeared to wait for the last object to catch up.
content.summary: 15+ ufos slowly moving over portland 6-23-2012

content.detailedDescription: That evening we went outside to observe the iss fly over at 9:59 when we saw the reddish orange object.
content.summary: From my deck looking south east observed a yellow red orange circular shape move across the sky toward the south and diminish in size until it was gone. afterwards it left a high wide con trail that dispersed in 5 min. no strobe or navigation lights

content.detailedDescription: Police officer radio transmission to fello officer. witnessing officer, "hey, do you see those lights in the sky?, orange lights, they seem to be at about 5000 feet or so north of me, and look to be moving, i'm on the 5th street extension. they seem to be converging, and they look be changing color from pink to orange. maybe if you were in a dark place you could view them". i heard no communication from the 2nd officer. roughly 5 minutes later, 911 dispatcher reports that a resident on emerson street, resideing near the emerson grocery store is viewing an object in the sky. no further radio communication is heard. roughly a half hour later, 911 dispatcher calls the original officer and asks, "do you still see the lights?", two times she asked, and the officer didn't respond. other dispatcher reports that officer to be on another call and no further radio commuunication regarding the lights are heard. i was listening to these transmisiions on a police scanner in the neighboring town. it was about 11:00 pst, fairly clear, and some fog above the chehalis river, and a 1/4 moon which at that time was west of town and low on the horizon.
content.summary: Police offeicer reports orange lights in night sky  moving towards each other and converge

content.detailedDescription:
190 description: on june 23rd at 22:30 i observed a fire ball approaching me from above the neighbors house, from the east. i was getting into my truck. i called to my wife who was moving a car out of the driveway. i thought at first it was an aircraft engine fire, yellow flames, almost like a campfire in the sky. the fire light went to about 45 degrees past us then flamed out. about thirty seconds later i noticed a second ball of light(firelight) approach from the same direction. it too move passed us then flamed out. i went into the house and told my daughter to go out and look and a third went past and went farther west then flamed out. suddenly a fourth ball of fire approached at about the same path and it burned out just above us. my daughter noted at that time that all of the dogs in the neighborhood began to bark. immediately after the fourth burnout a fifth approached and also burned out above us, about thirty seconds later all of the dogs quit barking. these appeared to be lower than normal airplane traffic and above the helicopter that transfers from one hospital to another several times a week. i am ex air force and i know what all types of aircraft look like. these were large flaming balls , no aircraft lights, red, green or strobe. a truly majestic sight to see. the best i can explain is that it looked like a distance campfire, but in the sky, moving faster than normal aircraft. location, albion road, north royalton ohio 44133, moving east to west just south of albion road. the last object i looked for red and green lights and strobes but none were present. i have never seen aircraft like these and there were aircraft in the air that night that were clearly airplanes.

180 description: firelight in the sky, approaching very fast then flaming out.
content.summary: Looked like a campfire in the sky, moving fast

content.detailedDescription:
At 9:10 est tonight, june 23, 2012, my wife and i were saying goodbye to family visiting us for the evening. the sky was clear with a thin crescent moon nearing the horizon.  my son-in-law, daughter, wife and i noticed 3 lights in the sky, one behind the other, with about a 20-25 deg separation, traveling in a straight wnw to ese direction.  we first noticed them at approx. 35 deg off the wnw horizon "flying" toward us over a neighbors house across the street.  a fourth object also appeared from behind the neighbor's house but was perhaps 30 degrees behind the third object, a bit of a straggler.  helicopter exercises, i thought, but never saw lights on them like these, and, they were completely silent!  they seemed to be moving at a speed a bit faster than the helicopters i usually see around here.  i said that these were really unusual. my wife went back into the house and retrieved my 15x70 astronomy binoculars and a regular 7x50 pair as well.

while observing them with my astronomy binoculars the light which each one emitted appeared more as a flickering or wavering "plume" of light, like a propulsion kind of effect although at the same time the light seemed to be more reflective rather than coming from an energy source.  as each object approached near it's highest elevation the light changed from a more reddish hew lower in the sky to a more yellowish hew to white and then went from dim to completely out having reached its highest elevation.  earth satellites do this as they cross overhead and into the shadow of the earth's horizon although they don't change color as these objects did.

i observed the objects as well with my regular 7x50 binoculars which actually revealed a roundish dark structure about a third again as big, behind and surrounding the "light" the object seemed to be emitting.  i actually had the impression that they could have been helicopters with large under-mounted reflectors attached to them. this may have been reflecting the remaining sunlight off the horizon but i don't think they were high enough since it was fairly dark by then.  if they were helicopters, they were stealth in nature because there was no sound coming from these objects.  we have military helicopters flying around here and often with 2, 3 or more at a time. there is a helicopter base within 20-30 miles of us.

if i hadn't looked up as i normally do, going out at night, we would not have witnessed what we did.  i know the sound of helicopters (normal ones anyway).  they are loudest coming toward you and less "thumping" moving past and away from you.  these objects made no sound at all and were close enough to do so if they were of the normal variety.  these objects were really strange to witness.
content.summary: 4 lights (red to yellow to white plume-like) eminating or reflecting from dark objects approx. 20-25 deg separation traveling straight line  disappearing  at  highest altitude.  soundless.

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend went out to smoke and he ran upstairs to tell me to come outside and we saw a very bright starlike thing going very fast. normally we would hae thought it was a plain because we can hear it but there wasnt plus due to the fact it was super bright and the speed was not something thats normal. we watched it and then all of a sudden it disapeared.. it gave us both chills.
content.summary: It was very bright and moving very fast then it disappeared. it gave us both chills

content.detailedDescription:
I'm approx. 30 miles east of the location given in report #39741. at 10:50 pm on june 22, 2012, my wife and i watched the international space station pass overhead. this visible pass began at 10:50 pm, it rose in the sw at 10 degrees, peaked at 84 degrees overhead, and set in the se at approx. 10:55pm (can't access info for the pass after it has occurred), darkening long before getting close to the horizon. we could see the "cross", as described in the previous report, which is either the solar panels or the side structures. i use the heavens-above website to watch for visible passes of the iss and we will get another good one on june 25 at 9:45pm starting in the nw, peaking at 72 degrees in the sw, and setting at 9:51pm in the se. 

i'm not a debunker or even a sceptic, as i have many previous ufo sightings. i just happen to be fairly certain i know what this one was. thanks for the reports.
content.summary: Re: report #39741  submitted: 2012-06-23 	 occurred: 2012-06-22 i'm 99% certain this report was a sighting of the iss.

content.detailedDescription: We were out looking at saturn, looked above our heads, saw a bright object, star like no sound no vapor trail, no red or green blinking lights observed for about a minute and a half it turned slightly red and then disappeared star like but larger
content.summary: Bright star like object, going west to east, turned reddish and then dissappeared

content.detailedDescription: Observerd a orange light over the tree line pull over to have a better look and show to capanion. it did a hard right wived stopped them flew strait up and out of sight in a matter of seconds. only caught a glimps of it on my cell camera this was just outside a small town called berkley
content.summary: Orange light

content.detailedDescription: We were walking tonight and saw a red and oragng fireball looking craft glowing in the sky!!It flew around dissapeared,than reappeared in another location just to the right,we watched it for about 40 seconds,and than it went upwards and dissapeared!!  almost as if it turned into a star!! we waited a little while to see if it was going to reappear but nothing yet..It was gnarly!!
content.summary: We were walking tonight and saw a glowing red and orange light .It dissapeared than reappeared,than flew slowly for a few seconds than accended up than dissapeared!!

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: We came out of the garage and rick noticed both ufo ships in the air off towards kirkwood and ely area. they were round with a yeollow light all the way around it with a orange hew off the yellow light of ships. there was a dome at top also lighted. we noticed it was hovering for a few minutes, then shoot off moving closer to us, then they both hovered again... one then very slowly disappeared into the clouds then the second one did after that... you could continue to see the light under the clouds for most of the night. tonight you can still see the glowing under some clouds but not sure if it is the same two ships from last night. we have never been alien theorists. this however made much more of a believer out of rick and myself. we thought we should report this somewhere we believe our neighbors also show them from their backyard. though we have not spoken to them still of sorts in shock. makes on not feel as safe. those ships were massive in size... there is no way those were anything like ours we use in our world. we just do not have anything that huge, and they were not solar flares either... we would like to know if anyone else reported this or if anyone has an idea exactly what we saw in our local air space??? thanks for any help you can offer.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: We came out of the garage and rick noticed both ufo ships in the air off towards kirkwood and ely area. they were round with a yeollow light all the way around it with a orange hew off the yellow light of ships. there was a dome at top also lighted.

content.detailedDescription: Stepped outside to smoke a cig in front yard. i live in the final approach of msp west to east approach and am very familiar with aircraft in the sky. i noticed 3 glowing (flaming like) vertical cylindrical objects off to the nw about 8-10 miles away at about 55-60 degrees above the horizon. the 3 objects formed 3 points in the sky like a equal sided triangle until the highest (apex) object moved to the right above the object in the lower right position of the triangle. these two then moved rapidly north at the same altitude then vanished as if the lights went off. the remaining object continued to hover in it's original position until the others vanished then it took a similar coarse at a slower speed to about the same spot then it also vanished. they didn't appear to travel out of sight due to distance but rather they just stopped emitting light so they could not be seen. i considered they might be hot air balloons because the glow seemed to flicker like flames but the speed they traveled was far to fast for balloons. i was able to have my roommate come out and see them also. this is my first experience with a ufo. i'm a 49 yo male with excellent eyesight and was not impaired at the time of the sighting.
content.summary: 3 glowing verticle cylinders, then 2 moved north and vanished, 3rd followed soon after

content.detailedDescription:
Walking on the adjacent street notice one prominent light under the clouds.  this then moved into more lights totaling up to twenty.  the first set made a  diamond shape in the sky while the others made a trail.   
two lights moved towards each other then moved apart.  
i ran home and went to my neighbors house, and got him and his wife out of his house to observe what i had saw.  by this time there were about 5 lights hovering in the sky.    
my wife was walking with me and ran home as well.   
the color of the lights were an amber color if not gold.  
i called the news and 911.  

i did not have my phone with me, the only time i do not carry my phone.
content.summary: Moved in a pattern, two orbs approached each other then moved away.  they all disapated

content.detailedDescription:
Driving north on 138 in tiverton i noticed an incredibly bright flamelike object traveling overhead. at first glance i thought it could be a missle. it came closer to me causing me to swerve off the road. i took a right on hayden ave to get a better look and try and take a pic of it with my phone. but as i parked i could see it slowing and then hovering and before i could click my camera, the flames just went out and i could no longer see where it went. there was no sound whatsoever coming from this object.
the edges of this object were jagged in appearance and i could not tell what shape the actual moving object was. 
it was low flying a few hundred feet above power lines which really scared me. never, ever in my 52 yrs have i seen anything so foreign.
i am curious how many others saw what i did. i could not have been alone. and i am certain of one thing....Whatever the technology used to fly this object, it is unknown to me and i am most intrigued as to whether there could be beings aboard or if it is a droid. i was panicked and amazed and truly shaken by what i saw. i immediately called my bf at work, who called up this website and i told him as soon as i got in the house i would post.
content.summary: Witnessed flame-like object traveling south in a path, then hovered and flames went out

content.detailedDescription: I work in disability services and at the time i was walking with a client to play basketball at a nearby middle school.  the sky was overcast and the temperature was neither overly warm or cool.  as we were walking, we came to an intersection and i was looking to make sure it was safe to cross the street.  as my gaze returned to what was in front of me, i saw on object hovering in the air.  i was immediately curious as to what it was, as it wasn't making any sounds that i could determine, or if it was, it was either too far away for me to hear, or was drowned out by other sounds.  i looked at it for a moment, while the realization dawned on me that i had no idea what i was looking at.  it appeared to be a dark grey or black cylindrical oval.  at first the points of the oval were pointing vertically, but the object was rotating counter clockwise along the more narrow axis, and the points of the oval moved from vertical to horizontal to vertical multiple times.  the object was slowly moving to the east (left from my perspective) and eventually disappeared behind a large fir tree.  i walked around the tree in an attempt to continue watching the object, but i was unable to find it in the sky a second time.  as i was watching it, i felt very calm, but also energetic (yet not in a restless way).  once i had lost track of it, for the rest of the day i could not stop thinking about it and trying to analyze what i had seen.  the client i was with saw it as well, but did not seem interested by the object.
content.summary: Rotating black ovoid cylinder seen, then disappeared behind tree and could not be found again

content.detailedDescription: Outside next to riverbank talking with 2 other friends. looked up into the night sky just to observe stars. thought it was a shooting star for an instant. the object was bright and all white, non flashing, circular with absolutely no sound. the object was surrounded with a white glow like aura which was slightly dimmer then the center source of light. it flew in a straight path overhead at about roughly 300 feet. really curious as to what this was. reactions from the three of us were "what is that?" we compared it to a few airplanes higher than the object and it varied greatly to that of a typical plane. we lost sight of the object due to cloud coverage.
content.summary: White, soundless circular aura flew overhead

content.detailedDescription: This was by far the best event i have witnessed, the same light same object came over and slowed down at one point as if it was putting on a show for me. last night was stormy and you couldn't see anything sure enough tonight is crystal clear and it came back and was it's best showing yet.I was completely overwhemled with happiness when it slowed down the way it did and just stuck around these events are becoming so addicting its unreal.
content.summary: Bluish white light that vanished

content.detailedDescription:
While this is still fresh in my memory, nj and i were standing outside smoking a cigarette. i was looking up like i always do at night and saw towards the northwest a solid light. i yelled at nj and said what is that!!! it flew towards us staying solid white. nj said that's a plane, and i said no way, no flashing lights, and way to low to be a satellite. then right when it got above us, it started to fade, and then disappeared completely, and not a cloud in the sky. truly like nothing i have seen in the sky since we bought this house, and i say that because every night i look up.

this is what i posted that night on face book. i had the feeling that it truly was something i could not explain, and sort of an eerie calm in the air. almost like it saw us looking, and decided to disappear. i look up almost every night, and can easily spot satalytes. by no means was this a satalyte or plane, very strange. i actually saw almost the same thing last night, a lot quicker, and moving the opposite direction.
content.summary: See post below, which is what i posted to my facebook page that night.

content.detailedDescription:
While laying in bed @ approximately 0200hrs in bellflower, ca on 22 june 2012 with the curtains pulled back. i noticed three bright flashes within five minutes. these night flashes lasted approximately 5-7 seconds each. during the second flash,i woke my girlfriend who was sleeping next to me and she to observed the brilliant blue light in the sky. after the third bright flash i stared getting tweets from my friends in the bellflower, ca neighborhood who were up and in awe at the night sky. 
i looked in the press telegram the following day and did not see anything about a meteor or a downed powerline in the area. i also don't believe a downed powerline would light up the city of bellflower.
content.summary: Three brilliant blue flashes of light over the city of bellflower, ca that made the city look like mid-day at 0200hrs on 22 june 2012

content.detailedDescription:
last sunday evening about 10:20 pm (6/16/12) my neighbor and her two kids were sitting on her front step looking at the western sky.   what they all three saw made her call me and tell me to go look to the west from my yard.  

my yard ends abruptly at a cliff that overlooks about 3/4th of kansas city, missouri, all of kansas city, kansas and several small towns up the missouri river north of kansas city.  i walked out into my yard and, against a very dark sky at about 10:25 pm, was startled to see a strange formation of reddish/reddish-white, glimmering objects in the sky about 35 degrees above the horizon.  there were four objects that appeared to be moving in trail formation, coming from the north, north-west flying on a heading of perhaps 160-170 degrees, a heading that i decided would take them to kansas city downtown airport.  however, when they were almost straight west of me, they each turned, still in trail, and circled to the west, making a wide 360 degree turn until they were back in front of me.  they then continued to the south, south-east and went out of sight, disappearing behind some trees.  then a fifth object appeared flying the same course, but when it was straight west of me it suddenly vanished, totally disappearing from sight.

these objects appeared to be shaped such that they reminded me of two old- fashioned glass telephone insulators joined at the flat part and upright so they seemed more tall than wide.   they appeared narrow at the top and bottom and a little fatter in the middle.  the color seemed more red at the top and bottom and became more reddish-white closer to the center.

unlike the sharply, distinct, rotating beacon, and the more modern strobe lights on an airplane, these objects appeared to be emitting a fuzzy light from all over their surface.   they reminded me of five japanese lanterns with the light coming from within the object.

the speed of each object was simular to what i would expect of a small airplane, like a cessna 152.  maybe the most unusual part of this whole 
experience was that there was absolutely no noise coming from these objects.  they certainly appeared to be close enough that had they been any aircraft that i know of, i would have heard a noise.

i have been a professional pilot for 58 years and most of my time was at very high altitudes where the weather was usually nice and clear.  in all of my 20,000 plus hours in the air i have never seen anything that remotely resembled a ufo as described in most sightings ... until last sunday night.  while flying at high altitudes i have watched satellites go over, but never a ufo.   i can remember maybe 30 years ago when pilots were reporting ufo sightings on a regular basis.
content.summary: Sunday night (6/16/12) i watched five objects in the sky that i considered to be ufos.

content.detailedDescription: Some lights in the sky when we got under it it was huge i thought in 25 years i would see it on tv now that it hasn't i'm recording it to you
content.summary: Huge like a and long gated stop sign

content.detailedDescription: Some lights in the sky when we got under it it was huge i thought in 25 years i would see it on tv now that it hasn't i'm recording it to you
content.summary: Huge like a and long gated stop sign

content.detailedDescription:
This is a confirmation of the below two sighting reports (shown below).

mufon # 35024 (#1 below)
mufon # 34937 (#2 below)
	
additionally, a delaware sighting later that same evening bears similarity to the three observations in pa that night.
nuforc # s86669 (#3 below)

and, the previous evening, sw of the three pa sightings on 18 january,  a very similar craft was observed. 
nuforc # s86663 (#4 below)

interestingly, reporter #1 saw a single craft the previous evening.


i arrived home in the time-frame of the two below reports (~6:45 pm). as i backed into my parking space, i observed two sets of lights toward a mostly east direction. initial observation indicated to me that they were a pair of military helicopters in the distance. i assumed this due to the fact that the 'choppers' were in a somewhat typical flight pattern. that being one offset and a bit higher/lower than the second.

as i walked to my mailbox, i watched and assumed that they would be coming nearly directly toward/over me as this is the typical flight path for aircraft traveling east toward mcguire afb / lakehurst nas. i have many low-level flyovers of military aircraft to these military locations.  i am approximately 40 miles from these facilities.

as i watched, i realized that the craft were flying in, from my perspective, a more southerly direction. this is a bit of an unusual flight path for low altitude aircraft. my view was obscured periodically by leafless trees and a couple of homes.

as the craft traveled it became obvious that the direction had changed as indicated in #2 below. this direction change put the path coming nearer to me. i am nw of philadelphia.

as the two craft came into full-view in my south direction, and at the apparent nearest, i had an unobscured view for about 30 seconds. what i observed was different than those below. it was not until this point that i became really interested in the craft. this was my nearest observation of them.

as indicated below, there was absolutely no sound coming the craft.

i observed what appeared to be two individual aircraft. the leading craft was lower than the following one. what i saw were four lights. three white and one red, on each of the objects. there was no symmetry in the lighting pattern. i saw no variation in intensity of the lights. additionally, i am / was unable to put a shape to the objects in question. the position of the lights on the craft made no sense.

the lighting configuration on both craft were identical.



i first saw the craft at a 7 degree elevation (this elevation number is quite accurate) and 81 degrees toward the east. utilizing the location information from #1 below and a distance of 19 miles from my location, would yield an altitude of 2.3 miles above witness #1.  i believe that i first saw the objects very close to the time as seen by #1 below.

when the craft were nearest to me, the elevation was approximately 11 degrees. utilizing the information from #2 below, that being turning west, distance from me to the objects would be approximately 2 miles. this yields an altitude of about 1/2 mile. obviously, there is a problem here.

i had the objects in view for some period of time. it was not beyond 10 minutes.
utilizing a 10 minute time-line and the distance traveled by the objects as seen by me, approximately 25 miles, yields a speed of 150mph. again, different than the speed indicated in #2 below.

although there variations in the observations, there is no doubt that all three observations were of the same objects during the same time period.

what they were is certainly unknown to us. the flight looked 'military' in formation.
possibly some 'stealth' type plane / chopper.
but who knows ?


#1
january 18th at 6:40pm
levittown, pa
mufon # 35024
. . .(17th sighting information) . . .  on january 18th at 6:40pm i was driving in levittown, pa southbound on woodbourne rd shortly past the roads intersection with business route 1, heading towards trenton rd. above the residential section to my left, i saw two sets of three horizontal lights that appeared to be stationary to my left. one set of lights was slightly above and to the right of the other from my vantage point. the lights were the same as i witnessed the night before, but now there were two sets of them. i drove into the section to get as close to the lights as i could. at 6:41pm, i called a relative who resides in the section to look at the objects. as i got closer and towards the end of the residential section as it met bristol oxford valley rd, the lights started to move and again as had happened the night prior, the large sets of three horizontal white lights were no longer visible. the lights flew over the edge of the residential section and woodbourne rd in the southwest direction. at one point i was only a few hundred feet from being directly under the objects. i could hear no sound being emitted from them. i followed the direction of the two aircraft as i headed towards my relatives house. i was now behind the aircraft. the structure of the lights resembled a cross or plus symbol with two white lights on the sides with two vertical red lights on top of each other in the middle. the lights were blinking. i arrived at my relatives house and we watched the objects fly southwest towards northeast philly in formation from a window in the upstairs of the house. approximately 5 minutes had gone by between first sighting them and their lights fading as they flew too far to see.


#2
january 18th at 6:45pm
northeast philadelphia, pa
mufon # 34937

four family members, including myself, were walking returning home after grocery shopping in northeast philadelphia, pa at around 6:45pm on wednesday, january 18, 2012. we first noticed the lights flying very low and close to each other back to back, almost as in a flight formation, with absolutely no sound. we could not make out a solid object around the lights that we witnessed. at first, both sets of lights appeared to be in a single horizontal line, with white lights on the sides and a large red light in the center. my son ran inside and grabbed his hd camera, and after zooming in, we realized that the large red light in the center was actually two red lights stacked one above the other. because of this, the lights looked like the following ��� : ���

again, in the video footage (to be uploaded at a later date), the lights on the sides were white and the two in the center were red; there were two of these sets of lights, making for 8 lights in total. in formation, they appeared to be diagonally flying next to each other, with one on the bottom left and one on the top right. the pair appeared to fly almost directly over us and then drifted off towards the west, over neighboring montgomery county, pa. the lights speed was slow, possibly traveling at 10 to 20 mph. my son claims to have seen one of the sets of lights shoot up into the sky, while we saw the other one disappear beyond the tree line. i personally did not witness the first set of lights shoot up. what we witnessed was definitely not anything ordinary, especially since i am usually skeptical of ufo sightings.



#3
january 18th (reported at 7:17 pm,  19:17)
lincoln, de
nuforc # s86669

i saw blinking lights in the sky, & think it was hovercrafts.

i went to take my dogs outside when i noticed 3 blinkings lights in the sky. they looked like they were far away and i assumed they were planes... that is until i realized they weren't moving, just hovering. i ran inside and got my littler brother who came and had a look for himself. the lights appeared to be moving just a tiny bit but not too much. one went dark then came back on.. then after a few minutes both of them stopped blinking and it looked like they disappeared. - by the way they were changing from red to white in color.


#4
occurred : 1/17/2012 23:00 (entered as : 1/17/2012 23:00)
reported: 1/18/2012 8:50:34 am 08:50
posted: 1/24/2012
location: west chester, pa
shape: triangle
duration:8 - 10 minutes
slow low flying unidentified craft

front of craft had multiple very bright white lights, something between 3 and 5. craft was flying very low level and moved very slowly, appeared to be heading from north to south with no deviation of course. back of craft revealed blinking red lights, two or three. this craft travelled within a very close distance of brandywine airport, but passed it by. when the craft travelled overhead a sound of a jet engine was present but very faint. was very odd for the slow speed of the plane and very low sound output. i was surprised the craft did not fall out of the sky. it appeared to be moving no faster than 40 mph. any assistance that could be provided with finding out if this was "one of ours" would be greatly appreciated.
content.summary: Confirmation of two philadelphia area reports

content.detailedDescription: Saw this ufo in my backyard on the evening of 6-10-12. appeared stationary but seemed to be spinning rapidly. remained visible for approximately 5 minutes.It never seemed to move at all during aside from what appeared to be an on axis spinning motion. we never saw it leave..It just disappeared.I shot a series of raw 18mp images. photographed using full zoom 135mm lens.Object still appeared hard to discern during shooting. blown up images reveal an object which is still impossible for me to identify. also recorded hd video but its very shaky. i'm hoping to get it stabilized before sharing.
content.summary: Saw this object in my backyard on the evening of 6-10-12. appeared stationary but seemed to be spinning rapidly.

content.detailedDescription: It was about 10:50pm i took my dog out before bed which i do every night and i always look up to see the stars. so as i was looking north east the night sky was beautiful and when i looked directly up and a little behind me i saw a bright object which at first i thought was a star but it was moving slowly so i thought it had to be a plane but i didn't see any lights flashing so i just kept looking straight up at it. it had a bright light around it with what i would call a cross but a fat cross inside of it. it kept traveling northeast and getting a little faster and light was getting dimmer and then gone. it had to go the speed of light. i got the chills and my eyes watered and i said thank you.
content.summary: It was very bright  white ring around it with a fat cross in the middle

content.detailedDescription: I was at my appt and it was approximately between 1:30-1:45am on june 23 2012. i heard moaning and thought maybe someone was hurt, but when i looked out my window i saw a couple "messing around" down below. i then noticed what looked like to me a shooting star, coming straight down from high in the sky, it was very bright and very fast. then all of a sudden it stopped, and was hovering above some buildings in the distance. it was not moving forward, backward, or side to side, it was stationary. the lights looked like headlights from a car and as i took a closer look i realized that the lights were moving in a rotating motion. that went on for about 2-3 mins. then the lights went out but i could still see the object in the sky, it was disc shaped and large considering it was quite the distance away. it stayed in the same spot, did not move and lasted about 2-3 mins. then the object emitted a large lightening like flash, then it went straight back up in the sky, faster then it came down. i would say it took 20 seconds for it to disappear from my view. i was in shock as i witnessed this, my phone was being charged and i honestly didn't even think to grab it to take a picture. i live in an appt building and i'm about 6 floors up, when i looked at the object it was straight in front of me hovering about 3 feet above where i was.
content.summary: Saw object come straight down from the sky, hovered over buildings, lights turned off, still could see it, then big flash and it went straight up faster then it came down.

content.detailedDescription: Travelling south of sherwood park, east to west at about 200,000 km/hr. 3 am in the morning.
content.summary: Video of ufo fleet

content.detailedDescription:
It was a warm evening so i decided to spend some time observing the sky in my back yard.
i have seen satellites going over my area before so i didn't think too much of this object, but as i watched it coming from the north west heading in  a southerly direction it  suddenly made 
a zig zag type of monuver  then flashed and disappeared .
content.summary: Star like object observed overhead

content.detailedDescription: First seen by a friend at approx 0450 in ventura county. two objects hovering in the sky towards the east vertical to each other. friend's distance to me was approx 2 miles apart horizontally. the bottom object seemed closer and had a very bright light and the top object had a faint light. friend then drove approx 10 miles towards the objects which did not move any closer or change their distance to each other. i stayed in a stationary position until the objects disappeared as the sun came over the horizon. possibly hovering over la county or farther east.
content.summary: Two objects seen; one with a bright light the other with a low light

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription:
I was in the kitchen making myself an early morning snack, when the coffee pot in the kitchen turned itself on. the unit is not scheduled to turn on, and i checked.

about a half minute later, the shop vacuum downstairs turned on, which it has never done before, as well as the main television unit in the living room.

after turning off the electronics in the household, i went to check the time on my phone which i had on the counter. even though i had just taken it off the charger in my room, it had shut off, and was refusing to turn on for some reason.

i heard an owl outside, or at least i thought it was an owl by the sound of it, i never saw what was making the noise, however, i went outside to check, when above me, i see what i though was the light from a car over my head, upon looking closer, it appeared more closely to four, aurora like ripples across about a quarter of the sky.

i had seen something like this on another night where i saw a craft i reported, however, i had discarded this fact as unimportant at the time, thinking that it may have been my mind playing tricks on me, however, after early this morning, i know for certain what i saw wasn't an optical illusion or a case of a mistaken identification.

about 5 minutes after seeing the ripple, i spotted the first craft i observed during the early morning, it was a elongated, cigar shaped ufo, flying below the early morning cloud layer at a slightly awkward angle(about 10-15 degrees off from how you'd expect an object of its shape to fly) and it flew in a straight line from the nw to the se of the horizon, taking about 3-5 seconds to completely cover the distance and vanish beyond my line of sight beyond the treeline. its apparent size was to narrow to be the of a bird or bat, and no wings at all made it have the wrong profile. 

after another 30 seconds or so, a second object became visible for a few seconds towards the se of my location, this object appeared to be glowing golden orange, with a deeper golden orange straight line patterning upon its surface. this object in only what i could describe as blinking into sight, the object remained immobile and eerily still for the time it was observable, and just as it had appeared, the object seemed to just blink out of sight.

i remember feeling a sense of curiosity and anxiousness, as i usually feel when i observe these kinds of objects, however, i did feel a bit alarmed with the electronics turning on and my cell phone refusing to apparently turn on.

after these incidents, i stood outside for a while longer, hoping to observe more phenomenon, as dawn began to break, i went back inside, only to discover my phone was now on with the main screen waiting to be unlocked, as though it had never been turned off.

after going through the house a bit more to see if any other devices were having issues, i came to discover the downstairs door, which was locked and dead bolted around midnight, was now completely unlocked for some reason, what relevance this may have to events is unknown.

both my mother and father, who live in the house with me, slept through the entirety of these events, and the dogs we have did not bark a single time, even with the shop vacuum turning out right outside their doors. i found this incredibly odd, as usually the slightest noise during the night will put the dogs in a barking frenzy, yet not once during the nights events, did i ever hear a peep from them.
content.summary: Multiple ufo sightings, precursed by strange aurora like rippling in sky and electronics turning on in household.
